CREATE TABLE [AspNetRoles] (
    [Id] nvarchar(450) NOT NULL,
    [Name] nvarchar(256) NULL,
    [NormalizedName] nvarchar(256) NULL,
    [ConcurrencyStamp] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_AspNetRoles] PRIMARY KEY ([Id])
);

);
